original_text: “When the Son of Man comes in his glory, and all the angels with him, then he will sit on his glorious throne.
korean_text: 인자가 자기 영광으로 모든 천사와 함께 올 때에 자기 영광의 보좌에 앉으리니

sentences.original_text: When the Son of Man comes in his glory
and all the angels with him
then he will sit on his glorious throne.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때에 그가 그 영광의 보좌에 앉으리라
